function.description:
Carries out the Put REST request. Returns response from server.
The body and response can be one of the following types: * XML (XmlNode) * JSON (Object) * String [with custom content type]
Options: * timeout - processing timeout in ms (default = 5000) * proxyhost - proxy server URL * proxyport - port of the proxy server * proxyuser - user name for proxy valdiation * proxypass - password for proxy valdiation
The proxy options can be combined as follows: proxyhost proxyhost+proxyport proxyhost+proxyport+proxyuser+proxypass proxyuser+proxypass
